About the Company: Shree Manufacturing Company Limited (SMCL) was incorporated on November 30, 1976 and commenced its business on July 21, 1977. The registered office of the Company is situated at Kolkata in West Bengal. Shree Manufacturing Company Limited was originally incorporated with the object of acquiring the all the assets and liabilities of Indian Copper Corporation Limited. The company is currently listed on Bombay Stock Exchange and Calcutta Stock Exchange. The management of the company is vested with the board of directors comprising of eminent persons with sound experience in business and administration.
